kpi.name: M1000C163

kpi_info.title: RB RELEASE BY PRE-EMPTION DUE TO BTS CONGESTION
kpi_info.use: The number of released radio bearers by pre-emption due to BTS congestion.This means either Channel Element shortage or maximum number of HS-DSCH MAC-d flows or HSPA users exceeded. This counter belongs to the key counter collection. UPDATED:When the radio bearer is successfully released.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB RELEASE BY PRE-EMPTION DUE TO BTS CONGESTION
